channel.title: CVE Feed for Solidigm -- D7-P5500
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Solidigm -- D7-P5500

item.title: CVE-2024-47975|2024-10-07T18:57:27.239Z -- solidigm -- d7-p5500
item.description: Improper access control validation in firmware of some Solidigm DC Products may allow an attacker with physical access to gain unauthorized access or an attacker with local access to potentially enable denial of service.
